website_summaries.verdict: Two-camera design gives you a nice amount of coverage at your property.
pros: Features a wide angle view of 130º that provides just a bit more coverage area than some other cameras
Full HD video resolution both day and night
Includes infrared LEDs to create the night vision capabilities that you need
cons: You'll pay more to have a dual camera system

customer_reviews.title: Useless as Security Camera with the most recent software update.
customer_reviews.text: With the recent software update, Google forces the status LED to be on at all times. At night this camera stands out in the darkness, actually alerting the potential intruder of its location and field of view. This blatant and intentional flaw makes my house actually less secure because potential intrude is made aware of camera's location and is able to bypass it. I called Nest and requested to return the camera for a refund, since the camera is now useless as a security device, and my request was denied. Google cares more about someone else's "privacy" than about the security of its paying customers. Will never purchase Nest or Google again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use!
customer_reviews.text: We like the cameras. They are super easy to install and have long power cords. The caveat I have with these is that the notification from the app is delayed and the delay is not predictable. Which means I have not been able to actually talk to someone that has approached (e.g UPS Delivery Driver)
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely overpriced for it's capabilities. Not to mention the fact that one of my two cameras does not even work. I am extremely disappointed in the time spent installing this inferior product. This seems to be what people who buy everything Apple gravitate towards. If you are able to think and research on your own, you will probably recognize there are similar options with better technology for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye Ring!
customer_reviews.text: Replacing my ring devices due to inconsistent connection even with full wifi signal. I've also pre-ordered the nest hello doorbell to replace my ring that has trouble connecting to my phone. I've called ring many times to remedy. They have always been helpful but a reliable security device is absolutely necessary. I'm tired of calling ring and troubleshooting all the time although they have been easy to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Ph.D. Ligon

customer_reviews.title: One camera didn't work?!
customer_reviews.text: These are not cheap and I wish I could of had the chance to exchange?! I didn't get them up until the end of JULY!!! One camera doesn't work!!!! I have several of these cameras!! I Would of appreciated to be able to correspond with them!!
customer_reviews.author: dmera

customer_reviews.title: NestCam
customer_reviews.text: These Camera's work great. Will be looking for more Nest Products. Super easy to install and works well with WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nest Outdoor cams
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to mount, connect & use. Also like the memory recall layout.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Barmer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned security wifi cams bought from Costco and on-line. They were cheap and unreliable. These cameras are solid and just work providing you have a decent wifi signal. However, the Nest cameras worked perfect on the same wifi network where the other two failed. And the others work with a base station. These just connect to the network and you access with the app. I have them on two rental properties. If wifi goes out, I get notification, when wifi is restored, cameras connect without fail.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome security system with great picture!!
customer_reviews.text: We first had the Ring Doorbell and I was not pleased with it. Decided to try out the Nest Cameras after reading the reviews. We absolutely love it!! The picture is great! Night vision could be a little clearer but overall it’s pretty good. Love how it takes continuous video unlike the Ring which only takes video when something is moving. The only problem that we have is that our 1 camera by the garage occasionally goes offline. It may be because of the WiFi signal.
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: 25% Camera Fail Rate
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 7 cameras died within a year or two. So I have about a 25% fail rate.... and these things aren’t cheap!
customer_reviews.author: TJWag

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless rollling camera.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the ooma cameras, amazon cameras, ring stick up. What they all lack is rolling recording and color night vision like the nest cam. These are the best it records rolling for 5 days for 5 dollars a month plus 3 dollars additional cam. It organized video by motion or person detection. Rolling bandwidth is less than 1.2 mbps. Its worth the monthly charge.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Warning Huge USB hole needed read me!
customer_reviews.text: We have six total nest cameras. Do you only thing that nest has designed a poorly is this huge USB connector that must go through the hole in your wall if you mount the camera outside in the power supply inside it’s almost an inch in diameter this hole that you must roll through every place you plan on putting a camera. Really Nest? Your designers are much smarter than that .
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Recently widowed, it was important for me to up my safety game, especially with a few neighborhood issues. My son installed these cameras at his house and recommended them for me. First reaction was "Wow, they're really expensive." But they are SO worth the investment. My son installed both in about 45 minutes. I have peace of mind. The cameras are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Daily

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We love the Nest Camera's we purchased two of them to monitor the front and back of the house the pictures are very clear and the alerts are great. We also have the Nest thermostat and it is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: NEST IS THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: NEST.... we all try the others.. fortunately Nest is the best.. started with Nest products a couple years ago thermostat + camera thought it was a little overpriced..BUT..you can depend on it..100% , punctuality, Clarity and ease of use is unsurpassed in any camera system out there stop wasting your time..Nest is the best.....
customer_reviews.author: don sl

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. They link to your iPhone. They work on WiFi, so you might have to boost the camera furthest away from your router. My biggest issue is that the camera code for WiFi is in fine print on the camera itself. The codes should be on a printed pamphlet in the box. If you change your WiFi code, you have to climb up a latter and try to read the code off of the camera, which I could do even with my glasses on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY CAMERAS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the indoor nest camera as well as the thermostat, so I decided to give the outdoor ones a shot...LOVE! They are crystal clear, you can set the parameter so it doesn't catch every car going by. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: concay

customer_reviews.title: Nest Camera
customer_reviews.text: Have had for one month free trial and started subscription. Excellent cameras. Easy to install for a novice. View /picture quality is great day or night. Much more activity around house then I was aware. Great Alerts from person in view to noise detection. Inexpensive subscription price for being able to retrieve footage.
customer_reviews.author: NGaut

customer_reviews.title: Great camera's and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: These camera's are great for the price; easy to install if you have a power outlet in place of easy to install per camera location. Some people don't like that you have to subscribe to the video history after 30 day free trial, but I have four of these camera's now and do the five (5) day rolling history and that suffices. Overall I am very pleased with the overall product and ease of installation (power being a wild card at times:)).
customer_reviews.author: Dougie Fresh

customer_reviews.title: The angle and distance, well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Best investment, I plan to buy a third one, easy to installed, captures everything, I was impressed when the nest cámara sent me a message saying there's moment, to my surprised it was a bird.. it's so accurate, highly recommend the nest.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, great detection, love the monitoring app
customer_reviews.text: I have two cameras outside and find them very useful. The driveway view detector movement from so far away, it’s fantastic. I have this connected to my indoor cameras on the same app, which is very convenient. The app is very user friendly and allows you to see live views as well as movements, which you are altered to via text notification. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Nest Cameras Actually Do Work with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Excellent video quality. Cameras do REALLY work with Alexa. They are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality , but the installation instructions were very poor. " Hook up and follow instructions" isn't an instruction. There is a point where, to set up a particular camera, you line up the bar code on the camera to your phone. I had to go online to find that out.
customer_reviews.author: hammer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Camera
customer_reviews.text: I already have four Nest Cams. I’ve had them for several years. These exterior cameras are even better than the interior cameras in that they are so easy to install and they have plenty of cable. If you need a security camera, this is the one. You will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: William S. Peery

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras and app
customer_reviews.text: The nest cameras are great cameras and seem well thought out in design and installation. The app is easy to use. I just wish it had a security light feature for night - I guess I misunderstood the description when I bought them. I am highly satisfied so far, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up / great value
customer_reviews.text: The product was very easy to set up and the picture quality and two way speaker is great. I started with two cameras and plan on adding two more. I am also going to install two cameras for my business. I also love the way I can monitor right from my phone not to mention the alerts I receive when there is activity. I also discovered that I have two different cats that cross on my back patio every night between around 11 PM. Love the system! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Pottenger

customer_reviews.title: Drops signal and is $5/mo for storage
customer_reviews.text: Drops signal occasionally. Make sure you have a WiFi range extender nearby to increase reliability. Also you have to pay $5/month to store your footage otherwise it’s just a doorbell camera or live video viewer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cameras, sometimes they just stop working, cant figure out way, one still not working, only three months old, need better support
customer_reviews.author: Florence Gales

customer_reviews.title: BEST Security Camera
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Great picture and motion detection. Love the functionality of the app. I setup three outside my house - One at the door, one pointed at my driveway, and one pointed to the side where we’re having a parking dispute with a neighbor. Can’t say enough good things about these cameras. Also like that you can talk through them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Cameras that give you piece of mind and security.
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras. You can view the surveillance on your cellphone or computer. Exceptional night vision. Cameras were installed and running on the computer in 30 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Morris

customer_reviews.title: Unprofessional support and not helpful at all
customer_reviews.text: Had to call support for product and we got the run around. Turns that their experts in the field are not experts at all. We had to go to a friend to find out what was wrong and get parts. This was not right. Almost returned product and still may.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Like the upgrades to the outdoor camera
customer_reviews.text: The new outdoor cameras are easy to set up and install. The additional length of wiring/cord provided many more options for where the camera is positioned and the screw in clips are preferable to using a staple gun to secure the cord. Great quality pictures- day or night
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cameras
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality just ordered four more after some problems which is rare in our neighborhood.’police said some of best camera they have looked at
customer_reviews.author: k2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and activate.
customer_reviews.text: The cameras were easy to install. The activation was straight forward once you download the app. Good quality on picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: NO video playback without PAID subscription.
customer_reviews.text: Withut subscripion service, the cameras dont allow any video play back. The product description doesn't allow customer to be aware of this, so will be made aware aware agter 30 day trial period from insstall date. Other cameras with lower subscription charges will give more value for money. If you live oitside the countires that dont allow for purchase of subscription service, then it gets worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these cams and will be ordering more. The image is crystal clear !!! Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good cameras for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! But I wish they would come with solar panels and wouldn’t need electric outlet!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I like the notification I get concerning movement and/or sound. You can easily move thru time to view images throughout the day. The color is good for outside daylight views. The night time views aren't as good....however placement and light source is important to consider. Just what I was looking for- I'm very happy with the quality of these cameras.
customer_reviews.author: jlt

customer_reviews.title: now i own four
customer_reviews.text: quality and a good price. that's why i bought 2 more..
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These were an amazing buy, we love them and their features!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gromowsky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play. Pretty simple to setup and install. Took maybe 45 mins because i really wanted to hide the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Brice S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, a little expensive but does the job nicely. It does require a subscription to Nest to take advantage of all features.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Feeling safe & secure.
customer_reviews.text: Love these cameras, I feel so much safer. I feel my picture quality will improve when I hook up my WiFi booster. These cameras don’t miss a thing, I can now see anything or anybody that is on or around my property. Highly recommend them if you want piece of mind, really!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: so much better than Ring. Great connectivity, picture quality and dependency
customer_reviews.author: mariya

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras easy install and good WiFi connectivity. Had to use 2.4g on far side of house but 5g reached all other cams. I wish they had a better system for excess cord management.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to have these cameras but there is a delay in what you see and live time.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great add on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and work great with the Nest Security system and the Google Nest Hub.
customer_reviews.author: blackhawkms

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !!
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are by far worth the money, so easy to install, they didn’t cheap out on the parts and hardware either. Plenty of cord length and very nice screws and wire holders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cameras would not work with my WiFi system and iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get cameras and iPhone iPad to communicate with each other through my WiFi setup. Product instructions did say camera may not work on all smart phones. I may have to fix my system or upgrade my iPhone SE or iPadPro. If I do and it works i'll regrade .
customer_reviews.author: DFerguson

customer_reviews.title: Hidden fees on cloud video storage per cam
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Additional fee for cloud video backup is a but steep and per camera charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 24/7 cloud monitoring
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install. I like the 24/7 monitoring as opposed to other cloud camera products that only capture motion events when triggered.
customer_reviews.author: Joe&Kat

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Already had the nest system with the thermostat and the door bell camera. These additional cameras were plug and play easily installed. Very high quality cameras for days and nights.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Best Camaras and service !!!
customer_reviews.text: The best so far of all of the ones in the market!!
customer_reviews.author: DSalazar

customer_reviews.title: use one use for  two months  the camera doens't work any more
customer_reviews.text: use one use for two months the camera doens't work any more
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE CAMERAS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE CAMERAS! I’ve bought several other brands and was also disappointed.. I have 8 of these currently at my salon and love them! I can chat back and forth and save videos for days without purchasing the extra cloud space!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ryan King

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these camera’s for my elderly father and they are excellent. Easy to install and high quality. I will get some for my own home. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the way they hook up, no exposed wires.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Software is easy to navigate. Picture and sound quality are great. Easily integrated in to the rest of the smart home ecosystem.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: SO far very happy. Ease of installation rating 10 camera clarity 10 web site ease of use 10. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and working great the first week.
customer_reviews.text: Overall impressed with the ease of install and simplicity of the app functions. Working well for our small business.
customer_reviews.author: Erik L.

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture is very good. A bit expensive. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: suzan jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality picture. Maybe a little too sensitive since it picks up bugs flying around!
customer_reviews.author: Dan McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, super easy to install. Stop looking. Just buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Flynn McLain IV

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great, a little expensive but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, easy operating experience, good view and clear sound
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Used in cattle barns
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a Cattle barn great pictures love the zoom feature not only can I monitor the cattle but it tells me if a person comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this! Very easy install, great picture! We live in the country and signal works with no problems. We will be buying nest products again! Also, product was packed very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Google has Ruined Nest!
customer_reviews.text: Nest used to be great when they were owned and supported by Nest! Not anymore. Now Google owns this camera and app. Bad news! Google doesn’t have a clue on how to troubleshoot these cameras that for the past 4 years I had zero problems. Now I do, and so will you! My advice: Do Not Buy Nest! Try Ring, Wayze, NetGear or ANYONE else that is not controlled by Google. Try calling Google Customer Service! You’ll lose your will to live!
customer_reviews.author: Otis Lift

customer_reviews.title: Nice..
customer_reviews.text: For what these are they work great. As a one camera system for simple house viewing I don't have issues. I wish they had more options for sleeker mounting. Having a 100' of cord attached as the only option makes for a less than clean install. I end up shoving it in the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: startagl

customer_reviews.title: 1 month in
customer_reviews.text: So far we are super happy. The picture is clear, even at night. We are happy with this purchase and the peace of mind it gives us. We can keep the alerts quiet at night but can track what has happened. We had a driveway monitor but could never tell what was setting it off. This gives us a clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: lilangelsmom

customer_reviews.title: One camera out of two had issues, replacement seems so so. Monthly fee and no WiFi no camera!
customer_reviews.text: So so so far. I wouldn’t say horrible but I’m not impressed with one of the two having a WiFi chip failing even though it’s DIRECTLY in line of sight. Under 40 feet. They did swap the camera but replacement camera seems to have a issue with really bright and or contrast adjustment internally.. giving it some time to check but so / so
customer_reviews.author: Technology geek.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price: Best outdoor camera
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cameras. They have great vision both at daytime and nighttime. They sent alerts when something in is view and are very clear. Won’t purchase another brand of cameras. Worth the price. We also pay the monthly fee to have the recordings.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras
customer_reviews.text: Best outdoor cameras by far. I got 6 and all have worked great
customer_reviews.author: ZL

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: one not working after 1 week, speed of upload slow and majorly delayed even with a 5 g wifi signal
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT B VAHEY

product_meta.title: Google Nest Cam Outdoor 2-Pack - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
product_meta.description: Style:2 Pack Outdoor CameraNest Cam Outdoor is a wireless outdoor home security camera that helps you keep an eye on what matters from anywhere, rain or shine. Get an alert when there’s activity.[1] Talk and listen from your phone. It’s weatherproof and plugs into power. And with 24/7 surveillance, know about a break-in before it happens. [1] Some features, including mobile notifications, remote control, video streaming, and video recording, require working internet and Wi-Fi. [2] Includes all Nest cameras, speakers, and displays in the same home. [3] Chromecast Ultra requires a TV with an HDMI port, a Wi-Fi network, a Google Account, a nearby electrical outlet or USB port, and a compatible mobile device. Minimum OS requirements are available at g.co/cast/req. [4] Intelligent alerts require a Nest Aware subscription. Familiar face alerts not available on cameras used in Illinois. [5] This feature is only available with a paid subscription, and either sound detection enabled or at least one eligible camera. This feature is dependent upon network connectivity and other factors, and may not be available in all areas. Wireless devices may not be reliable for emergency communications. The 911 feature can connect you with the call center closest to the home address you provide during setup. [6] Only available with Nest Cams, Nest Hello video doorbell, and Nest Hub Max.
feature_bullets: Outdoor Wi-Fi camera 2-pack for home security with 24/7 live video
High definition surveillance camera with a 130 degree wide angle view, 1080p HD, and 8x zoom; night vision illuminates the whole scene, even when it’s dark outside
Looks for motion and sound activity and sends an alert to your phone or email[1]
Control your home security camera from anywhere with the app on your phone
Built in speaker and microphone lets you listen and talk back to visitors
Weatherproof and plugs into power so you don’t have to worry about dead batteries
Easy to install; just plug in the cable and adapter and mount the camera
Subscribe to the new Nest Aware for up to 60 days of event video history and new intelligent alerts[2]
Please refer to the product description section below for all applicable legal disclaimers denoted by the bracketed numbers in the preceding bullet points (e.g., [1], [2], etc.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,665 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #2 in Complete Surveillance Systems#4 in Bullet Surveillance Cameras
